title: ACE DotShot
creator: Alcorn Cafe Engineering
content:
Pretty invasive mod where you need to [drill a huge hole into your micra](https://www.home-barista.com/espresso-machines/ace-dotshot-on-la-marzocco-linea-mini-t50695-10.html#p642517).
[Video if it here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jDwx-A-nhJY) that looks nicer than the screenshot below since it's top mounted and centered.
Found while googling for LMLM shot timers via [this Reddit comment](https://www.reddit.com/r/LaMarzocco/comments/1b8b0r0/comment/ktuaknv/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web3x&utm_name=web3xcss&utm_term=1&utm_content=share_button) which also shared the top-wood-mounted option below.
